page.title: 14SHOPS IN FOREST ROW
page.content: During the week starting May 15th, we polled all the pupils who live in Forest Row on a simple issue-are the shops there adequate? The shops in question are only in our assigned block.The answer was in the positive though many did shop in East Grinstead because of the increased variety.When asked if any new shops are needed, 2 proved the most popular: a new bike shop and a new sports shop.The area studied has a large variety of shops ranging from the standard(P.O., cake shop,grocers x2, banks) to the more unusual.There is a specialist sports car and speed boat shop, 2 health food shops, a traditional bakers, an outdoor activities shop and a luxury food shop.
